content:
Today I chose issue 15486 for discussion!

Tracking issue for slow field_simp calls replaced by simp
Created by @None (@grunweg) on 2024-08-04
Labels: t-meta

Is this issue still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?
These calls still exist: I would say it is still relevant.
